headline: Tracking the Evolving Union Pacific Narrative Amid Analyst Shifts and Merger Developments
summary: Union Pacific's stock price target has recently experienced a slight decrease, with the consensus analyst view shifting from $261.68 to around $260.58. This modest adjustment arrives as analysts weigh the company's longer-term growth opportunities against current uncertainties in the rail industry. Stay tuned to discover how you can keep track of ongoing shifts in the Union Pacific story as analyst expectations continue to evolve. Analyst Price Targets don't always capture the full story...
